section.title: Getting started
section.para: This is a simple java-gnome program. As you will see in the following definition of Example there's really nothing to it that you need to be worried about:
Place this code in Example.java and compile it.
This program has the drawback of not doing very much and even worse, not telling you that that's not what it's doing.
The way you fix that is by not making the call to Gtk.main() and instead just letting the program exit.
